dzeren: The Chinese yellow antelope Procapra gutturosa a remarkably swift footed animal inhabiting the deserts of Central Asia Thibet and China
dzeron: The Chinese yellow antelope Procapra gutturosa a remarkably swift footed animal inhabiting the deserts of Central Asia Thibet and China
dziggetai: The kiang a wild horse or wild ass of Thibet Asinus hemionus Note The name is sometimes applied also to the koulan or onager See Koulan
